Summary: Genetic proof and other scientific evidence of ETs.
divs: sighting detailsto: james carrion - mufon international director from: kenton lee fisher - investigative journalist re: the scientific evidence you may have been looking for. dear mr. carrion my research has caused me to cross paths with someone who i highly recommend that you get in touch with. he is a russian scientist (now based in new york), who���s research seems to have culminated in producing conclusive evidence that not only explains things like the star child skull, cattle mutilations, human abductions, ���ancient astronaut��� questions, etc., but can also connect the dots and fill in the remaining gaps relating to the entire ufo\uso phenomenon. according to him, not only are ���they��� walking among us today, but they (ets) have been living among us in a hybrid humanoid form for quite some time; and their ulterior motives are apparently not in the ultimate best interests of humans as a species. among other things, he is the author of a research paper titled ���save the human species���, and he has been trying to produce a documentary film (intended for american cinema), that would divulge all the evidence that he has uncovered. unfortunately, he has come up against some seemingly insurmountable barriers in the production of his documentary film, and i fear that (for geo-political reasons), even if it were to be completed, he would meet with extremely stiff resistance when trying to release it to the cinema circuits (or even tv media) here in the u.s. oddly enough however, abc television will soon be airing a sci-fi thriller movie on tv that is primarily based on the facts related to his findings. in any event, he is beginning to lose heart for his project, and is now skeptical that he will even find anyone who is credible and respected on this subject (here in the states), to even view his material - not to mention support it. nevertheless, i believe that collaboration between the two of you would be mutually beneficial, and i have included his personal bio and contact info below. as i���m sure a person of your common sense, deductive reasoning, and logical intellect already knows, the ���official��� story we were given by our government about the events of september 11, 2001 was nothing but lies intended to cover up what really took place that day, and the real motives behind it. as an independent researcher, investigative journalist, and freelance author, i (along with about 100 other fellow 9\11 truth seeking colleagues around the world) have been comparing notes for the past 8 years, and can now prove beyond a shadow of a doubt that 9\11 was a multi-national covert inter-governmental conspiracy (that was about 25 years in the making) - and was not perpetrated by a bunch of bare-footed cave-dwelling goat-herding moslems (led by a crippled 6' tall one who was actually dragging around a kidney dialysis machine in tow at the time), contrary to what we were told! the only problem is that, due to the financial\political\influential forces working behind the scenes (and the logistical controls held by the real perpetrators), it has proved almost impossible to bring our fact findings of the real truth to the general public, in an effective widely accessible format that would expose the underlying plot to the american masses, ample enough to spur the wheels of real justice into motion. the biggest problem is that the real perpetrators have been acting under the disguise of being major friends and allies of the u.s.; and in recent decades, members of their organization have infiltrated so much of our society that they now control most of our media - and regulate its content. while we in the 9\11 truth movement are now prepared to present overwhelming evidence of just exactly ���who done it��� (as they are commonly known, in ���earthly��� terms), and why they did it (from an ���earthly��� perspective),... obtaining a massive public forum from which to present our evidence has thus far been illusive. while the powers that be currently maintain full control over our network tv, radio, and newspaper media; they don���t yet own all of the book publishing companies, nor have they yet gotten a complete handle on the internet. while the later two venues still offer an outlet for such controversial material to see the light of day, only about half of the american public has the ability to access it, or the propensity to seek it. i personally will soon be releasing 5 books that break 9\11 down into 5 relatively easy-to-digest categories: (a comprehensive expansive time-line of related events, a book of quotes and other official admissions, a book containing more than 1000 questions that were side-lined by the 9\11 commission, a book presenting documented evidence and scientific facts that conflict directly with the official story, and a book outlining the motives of many of the major players - stopping short of mentioning any possible et affiliations *for obvious reasons*), but i fear that these books will fall into too few hands to do any significant good. be that as it may, the reason why i wrote to you is not to debate this issue, but rather because one of my recent colleagues has shown new light on this subject that seems to be much more in your ball park than in mine, as his evidence seems to indicate very strongly that, while the 9\11 truth research network has nailed down the international group who was really responsible for most such atrocities throughout our history, we still had no idea exactly who (or perhaps ���what���) these entities really were. according to my russian colleague, ���they��� are in fact hybrid alien humanoids of extra-terrestrial origin, who have been steadily and secretly evolving among us for centuries. obviously, i���m not about to go anywhere near mentioning that in any of my books, for three reasons. first of all, it is going to be hard enough for most mainstream americans to swallow the fact that a supposed long-time friend of our nation was actually just using us for evil purposes the entire time, and caused elements within our government to attack our own country - let alone sugesting to them that these imposters are also ets! secondly, except for the proof recently offered by my russian colleague, i found no previous evidence that suggested any such thing, and consequently have no other previous documentation to support it - possibly because none of the rest of us were ever specifically looking for it. and third, from a prosecutorial standpoint, the ancestral origin of a criminal element should have no baring on the preponderance of evidence against that criminal element, nor the prosecution, conviction, and punishment sentencing thereof. however, this does not mean that this is an insignificant matter (actually, quite to the contrary), but swift accurate justice would certainly be hampered (if not totally avoided) if we in the rest of the 9\11 truth community began to prepare a prosecution case based along those lines at this early stage. while his evidence appears to be quite solid, i will also admit that much of it is in areas of science that are a bit above my paygrade - so to speak. because of my inability to fully comprehend some of the science behind his findings, and due to my reluctance to publicize it in my efforts to spur the convening of a new and totally truly independent 9\11 investigation (unhampered by anything that might be construed as being ridiculous or ���outlandish���), i will be of no significant help to my russian colleague - but you might be ! the name of this researcher is dr. vladimir gouliaev, and his credentials and biography are all linked below. i���m sure that you and your staff will find his material to be at least quite interesting, and hopefully enlightening and compelling as well. i also think that you and your team will have a better understanding of the parts of his findings that i am not yet able to comprehend. please contact him at your earliest convenience to make arrangements to review his evidence, as he will be expecting to hear from you. telephone, email, and snail-mail contact info are all listed below. if you have any questions, or if i can be of any further assistance, please feel free to call me any time at: (610)-935-7321 , or simply send your inquiries to me at my return email address. thank you for your time, respectfully, kent fisher. information on dr. g. 1. my biography: http:\\www.yourhealth911.com\dr_g_music\dr_g_biography.html 2. snail-mail: dr. vladimir gouliaev 458 neptune ave., #11 f brooklyn, ny 11224 3. phone (office): (718) 265-7163 4. see also: http:\\www.yourhealth911.com\index.html regards, dr. g.
